xwikidoc.title: Design Test: Summer
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}} Google Summer of Code is a program ran by Google each summer since 2005, where it pairs talented students with open source communities, paying 5000 USD for the successful completion of an open source project under the guidance of one or more mentors. XWiki has been among the accepted mentoring organization since the start.
Every year Google prepares a [[GSoC Flyer>>https://code.google.com/p/google-summer-of-code/downloads/detail?name=GSoC2011FlyerA4.pdf]] advertising the program.
**Task:** Create a flyer advertising GSoC and XWiki's participation in a certain year. The Flyer should contain information about the GSoC program in general + [[GSoC logo>>https://code.google.com/p/google-summer-of-code/wiki/GsocLogos]] (choose any of the available logos), **AND** information about XWiki + [[XWiki logo>>http://www.xwiki.com/xwiki/bin/download/BlogFr/SolutionsIntranetWeb20Expo/Logo.jpg]], and eventually its [[proposed projects>>http://gsoc.xwiki.org/]].
You are allowed to style the logos as you wish to better fit together.
You are also responsible for writing the text of the flyer, feel free to ask for more information if needed.
Target audience: * **primary:** highly-skilled geek students * **secondary:** university professors who should inform their students {{/info}}
